items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t like not being able to control Mary.
Tom doesn\'t remember the first time he met Mary.
Tom saw some guy he didn\'t know talking to Mary.
Tom followed behind Mary, carrying two suitcases.
Tom found it hard to keep the conversation going.
Tom found something on the front seat of his car.
Tom found the treasure at the bottom of the lake.
How did you find a hair in the soup if I\'m bald?
My grandfather no longer has a driver\'s license.
I thought you and Tom were married to each other.
